definition: the elbow turns the wrong way/to favor an outsider instead of someone on one's own side (idiom)
pinyin: ge1 bo5 zhou3 chao2 wai4 guai3

sentences.english: Her arms showed green patches, indicating heavy internal bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 她的胳膊出現了青斑，表明有嚴重的內出血。

sentences.english: Then I rake my arm across the drainboard and send the dishes to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 然後我用胳膊把滴水板上的盤子通通掃到地板上。

sentences.english: The doctor sliced his arm open right in front of us.
sentences.chinese: 醫生當着我們的面在他胳膊上割開一條口。

sentences.english: It also appears to have what looks like a string-like arm protruding from its body.
sentences.chinese: 它的身體外凸出的胳膊像繩子一樣細長。

sentences.english: It is impossible to lick your elbow.
sentences.chinese: 你不可能舔着自己的胳膊肘。

sentences.english: She withdrew her hand timidly form his arm.
sentences.chinese: 她怯怯地從他的胳膊中抽出手來。

sentences.english: The two women leaned upon the wrought-iron window rail in the shadow of the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 兩個女人在窗簾的遮掩下，把胳膊肘支在鐵欄杆上。

sentences.english: Then she sat down and laid her head on Babs' arm.
sentences.chinese: 然後，她坐下來，把頭枕在芭布斯的胳膊上。

sentences.english: My elbow banged against the door last week and it still hurt.
sentences.chinese: 我的胳膊肘在一個禮拜前撞在了門上，到現在還很疼。

sentences.english: He leans his arms on the door and brings his face to the window.
sentences.chinese: 他把胳膊枕在車門上，把臉湊近窗戶。

sentences.english: A person who meddles or pries into the affairs of others.
sentences.chinese: 另外有個矮小的，好管閒事的人拉他的胳膊。

sentences.english: Goyle has short, bristly hair and long, gorilla-ish arms.
sentences.chinese: 高爾的頭髮短而硬，胳膊很長如猩猩一般。

sentences.english: She smoothed suntan lotion over her arms.
sentences.chinese: 她輕輕地把防曬油塗在胳膊上。

sentences.english: It is quick to smile nerveless sit on the ground, a hand pull Wang2 Yu4's arm.
sentences.chinese: 之敏笑得無力的坐在地上，一隻手拉着王玉的胳膊。

sentences.english: I fell off the ladder and hurt my left arm.
sentences.chinese: 我從梯子上掉了下來，傷了左胳膊。

sentences.english: Showing the arm a little bit is going to make you look taller and leaner.
sentences.chinese: 露點胳膊出來將使你看起來苗條修長。

definition: the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
